channel.title: Outdoor on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea
channel.description: Recent content in Outdoor on Drea Cole | Designed by Drea

item.title: Backyard Inspiration Board
item.description: We’ve been making good progress in our backyard so far…we finished building the ‘cabana’ and the landscaping is mostly complete!

item.title: Bali-inspired DIY Floating Brunch
item.description: You may have seen them on social media… Gorgeous photos of travelers enjoying a ‘floating brunch’ at a luxury resort in Bali or Thailand.

item.title: Hidden Tank Fire Table Roundup
item.description: I’ve been searching for the perfect fire table for our backyard, especially right now when the weather is chilly and we still want to enjoy our back patio.
